oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter discussing Grand Army of the Republic business
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter written on Department of Tennessee, Grand Army of the Republic (GAR) letterhead. The letter is addressed to "Comrade J.L. Reagan" of Little Crab, Tenn. From Sam W. Duncan with the Grand Army of the Republic. The letter acknowledges receipt of the Quartermaster's Report.
